alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 21 at 2:45PM CDT until March 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A Fire Weather Watch for parts of western and northwestern Oklahoma Wednesday afternoon... .Warm, dry and breezy conditions will contribute to favorable fire weather conditions during the afternoon and early evening on Wednesday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WARM TEMPERATURES, LOW HUMIDITY, BREEZY WINDS AND DRY FUELS FOR NORTHWEST AND WEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Weather Watch for warm temperatures, breezy winds, low humidity and dry fuels, which is in effect from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * TIMING...2 to 7 PM Wednesday. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...81 to 85 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward
